name: Axe to Grind
description:
The elves have invaded the hallowed halls of your ancestors! It's up to you to show those knife-eared bastards a real dwarven grudge. You've got an AXE TO GRIND!

Controls:
charge your swing by grinding your axe along the ground!
wasd/arrow keys - movement and charge swing
left click - swing axe
right click - dodge

Made by Salanderous and Snerdels for Game-Off 2022
Music by PipoPleading

Github repo: https://github.com/Salanderous/DwarfGame-
